title: Space Werewolves
description: The Tristan Lycanth book series comes to life. They came to our world to wipe us out. There was no one left to save us but her. She never wanted to be a hero, but they started this fight and sheâ€™s gonna finish it.
quote: You mess with the wolf, you get the howl.
